alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 7:58PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Windham, northern Tolland, northern Hartford, Worcester, west central Norfolk, southeastern Hampshire, central Middlesex, southeastern Franklin and southeastern Hampden Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 758 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Palmer, or 12 miles east of Chicopee, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Springfield, Framingham, Chicopee, Enfield, Leominster, Fitchburg, Marlborough, Amherst, Shrewsbury, Franklin, Milford, Orange, Westford, Acton, Ludlow, Gardner, Hudson, Westborough and Grafton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk
